# multiply se 
scores.long2 <- scores.long2  %>%
  mutate(se = 100*se)


# create y_min and y_max
m <- qnorm(1-.05/2)
scores.long2 <- scores.long2  %>%
  mutate(ymin = avg_score-m*se, ymax = avg_score+m*se) %>%
  mutate(ymin = ifelse(ymin <0, 0, ymin))
